感觉很棒，虽然是个老游戏，却是满满的创新，给人很舒服的感觉~！！！
toujours un plaisir même 8 ans après sa sortie
Игра вышла отличной, много головоломок, с которые замечательно сочетаются с шутками от Гледос и Уитли. Рекомендую
Just a fun game to play alone or with friends. I had tons of fun and I guarantee that anyone else who plays it will as well

终于单人通关了。
一个很棒的游戏。
开拓思维，
打破定势。
最后，我们还是朋友呢！爱心方块我会好好留着的
值得游玩，和机器人一起探讨人生
Originální koncept a propracovaná grafika i příběh.

2020年啦，也不知道是福是祸，不过我确实赢得了很多的时间来慢慢通关这样一款挺老的游戏（毕竟我只刚刚通关了单人模式）。在这里我要吐槽一下，传送门的机制让我时不时就有一点呕吐和眩晕的感觉，毕竟360°镜中世界旋转已经是正常操作，时不时的上下颠倒让我怀疑哪一个才是平地哪一个才是天空。关卡也相当的多，甚至多到常有一种要结束了吗要打boss了吗其实并没有的失望感觉。我并不是在说我是因为忍耐才玩下去的，事实上我相当享受这款游戏，大量的背景故事和人物关系穿插在关卡和谈话中。游戏也向玩家们抛出一个问题：没有限制的发展科学，或者是失去控制地发展科学，到底是好还是坏。当科学失去了伦理三观的时候，世界又会是什么样子，传送门的背景世界观给出了属于它的答案。这不仅让我联想到一件快要淡出热度的事情：一个“科学狂魔”刚刚修改了一对婴儿的DNA，并声称这可以让他们拥有免疫艾滋的能力。也不知道以后会出什么差错呢，也许没有事刚也没有，也许。。。。。。愿上天祝福人类吧。
G姐后面的歌也让人温馨，还有熟悉的恶作剧，原谅我是个自大狂，但我愿称这为傲娇对于感情的表达吧哈哈。不管如何，u want me gone, so i did it。感谢v社做出了一款优秀的游戏，goodgoodbye！！！
Классная графика и физика, да и к тому же сюжет, лично я не видел головоломок лучше, да и ещё кооп. Рекомендую

This game has a wonderful story and characters. I played this when I was around 8 years old I still cry watching the end. I love the characters and how valve did this games story. I hope, even though not likely, there is another portal game.
fantastic, both the Campain and Co-op, along with the many mods made for it!
The best video game of all time. Period. I have spoken.
Amazing game, a must-play for fans of puzzle games.
el juego es entre tenido y me rió a veces porque GLADOS tiene un sarcasmo es bueno
Great storyline and gameplay, Would recommend both 1 and 2.

One of the most unique and fun gaming experiences I've had. Amazing mechanics and puzzles. Outstanding narrative, ambient, and music. Also one heck of a funny game and silly characters. The ability to make your own chambers and play others online, along with co-op is amazing.

Bring a friend. Be ready to want to kill each other but grow closer at the same time. Amazing puzzle game, amazing story, great co-op. I recommend both co-op and solo play. And don't forget to try the player-made levels!

Excellent Story and Co-op mode. The puzzles are challenging but fun to solve. Really challenges your mind to think with portals. I love this game and still play this cause I enjoy playing with friends and family.

创意工坊使我快乐

好想再去一次月球
one of the best games i ever played

awesome but i wish it was more affordable for others
This is a VERY fun game, teaches you morals as well. Also, a good way to improve your logic skills. 10/10
Very nostalgic sounds and textures love this game

An amazing puzzle game, the single player is rewarding and funny, while the coop is just as amazing to play with a friend (especially if you wanna laugh at each other's stupidity from time to time). The only complaint I have is that in the challenge levels all the cutscenes and interactions still play which can sometimes take up to a minute, which gets a bit annoying if you restart the level a million times to try and break your record.
It´s an exceptional game, an all-times classic and it doesn´t necessarely needs you to play the 1 to enjoy it, which is a good thing.
One of the best multiplayer and especially singleplayer games out there. A must-buy for everyone that owns a computer or a Samsung Smart Fridge.
Very good.  A game that has to be played.
